languages.text: "Да очнись ты уже, дуреха! Этот ашмаг просто использует тебя, потешается, ставит опыты! Мы с тобой не раз говорили за бокалом асамека — за все в этой жизни приходится платить. Подумай, Идира, шерин. Много ли у тебя есть кроме себя самой?"

"Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"
languages.original_text: "Да очнись ты уже, дуреха! Этот ашмаг просто использует тебя, потешается, ставит опыты! Мы с тобой не раз говорили за бокалом асамека — за все в этой жизни приходится платить. Подумай, Идира, шерин. Много ли у тебя есть кроме себя самой?"

traits.locale_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「馬鹿言ってないで、目を覚ましな！このクズはアンタを利用して、こけにして、実験材料にしてるだけだ！アマセックを飲みながら何度も言ったじゃないか…この人生、あらゆるものに値札がついてるんだ。考えてみな、シャリーン。何かが無料っぽく思えるなら、それがアンタの値打ちなんだよ。分かるだろ？」
languages.original_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: 「馬鹿言ってないで、目を覚ましな！このクズはアンタを利用して、こけにして、実験材料にしてるだけだ！アマセックを飲みながら何度も言ったじゃないか…この人生、あらゆるものに値札がついてるんだ。考えてみな、シャリーン。何かが無料っぽく思えるなら、それがアンタの値打ちなんだよ。分かるだろ？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “醒醒吧，你这个白痴！这个坏种只是在利用你，玩弄你，用你做实验罢了！这些话我们不是在酒桌上说过一百遍了吗？生命里的一切，早已经在暗中标好了价格。看似免费的东西，往往要用你自己的性命来换。你还不明白吗，亲爱的？”
languages.original_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: “醒醒吧，你这个白痴！这个坏家伙只是在利用你，玩弄你，用你做实验罢了！这些话我们不是在酒桌上说过一百遍了吗？生命里的一切，早已经在暗中标好了价格。看似免费的东西，往往要用你自己的性命来换。你还不明白吗，亲爱的？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ouvrez les yeux, imbécile ! Cette vermine vous manipule, vous ridiculise et se sert de vous pour mener ses expériences ! Ce n'est pourtant pas faute de l'avoir rabâché autour d'un verre d'amasec : tout dans cette vie à un prix. Réfléchissez, shereen. Tout ce qui semble gratuit de prime abord se paie de sa personne. Comment pouvez-vous ne pas le comprendre ? »
languages.original_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: « Ouvrez les yeux, imbécile ! Cette vermine vous manipule, vous ridiculise et se sert de vous pour mener ses expériences ! Ce n'est pourtant pas faute de l'avoir rabâché autour d'un verre d'amasec : tout dans cette vie à un prix. Réfléchissez, shereen. Tout ce qui semble gratuit de prime abord se paie de sa personne. Comment pouvez-vous ne pas le comprendre ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Despierte de una vez! ¡Este ashmag te está usando y ridiculizando! ¡Está haciendo experimentos contigo! Lo hemos hablado un millón de veces con una copita de amasec de por medio: todo en esta vida tiene un precio. Piensa, shereen. Si algo parece gratis, es que el precio eres tú. ¿Es que no lo ves?».
languages.original_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Despierte de una vez! ¡Este ashmag te está usando y ridiculizando! ¡Está haciendo experimentos contigo! Lo hemos hablado un millón de veces con una copita de amasec de por medio: todo en esta vida tiene un precio. Piensa, shereen. Si algo parece gratis, es que el precio eres tú. ¿Es que no lo ves?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wacht auf, Ihr Idiot! Dieser Ashmag benutzt Euch nur, verhöhnt Euch, experimentiert an Euch herum! Wir haben es uns bei einem Glas Amasec so oft gesagt ... alles in diesem Leben hat einen Preis. Denkt nach, Shereen. Wenn etwas kostenlos zu sein scheint, seid Ihr der Preis. Erkennt Ihr das nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: "Wacht auf, Ihr Idiot! Dieser Ashmag benutzt Euch nur, verhöhnt Euch, experimentiert an Euch herum! Wir haben es uns bei einem Glas Amasec so oft gesagt ... alles in diesem Leben hat einen Preis. Denkt nach, Shereen. Wenn etwas kostenlos zu sein scheint, seid Ihr der Preis. Erkennt Ihr das nicht?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aklını başına toplasana salak! Şu külboğaz senden istifade ediyor, seni küçük düşürüyor, üzerinde deneyler yapıyor! Birer kadeh amasek devirirken ikimiz de kaç kez demedik mi, bu hayatta her şeyin bir bedeli vardır! Düşünsene şirinim. Bir şey beleşse aslında bedeli sensindir. Bunu göremiyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Wake up, you idiot! This ashmag is just using you, ridiculing you, experimenting on you! We've said it ourselves so many times over a glass of amasec — everything in this life comes with a price tag. Think, shereen. If something looks like it's free, then the price is you. Can't you see that?"

traits.locale_text: "Aklını başına toplasana salak! Şu külboğaz senden istifade ediyor, seni küçük düşürüyor, üzerinde deneyler yapıyor! Birer kadeh amasek devirirken ikimiz de kaç kez demedik mi, bu hayatta her şeyin bir bedeli vardır! Düşünsene şirinim. Bir şey beleş duruyorsa aslında bedeli sensindir. Bunu göremiyor musun?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
